Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the single cell of the Chess Board.
    Author:
    RAJAN

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tile

        public Tile(Piece piece,
            Position position)
        One and only constructor of the class.
        Parameters:
        piece - Chess piece that is present in the Tile.
        position - Position of the cell in the Chess board in form of (x,y) coordinates.

    • Method Detail

      • firstClick

        public void firstClick()
        When Player clicks for the first time on the any piece. Stores information about the piece.

      • secondClick

        public void secondClick()
        Initiates only after the first click, shows the possible moves of the piece.

      • getNode

        public javafx.scene.Node getNode()
        Getting the root node of each tile.
        Returns:
        root node i.e. StackPane.

      • highlightTile

        public void highlightTile()
        Highlights the clicked tile if piece is not null.

      • highlightTile

        public void highlightTile(java.util.ArrayList<Position> positions)
        Highlight all the possible cells for a piece to move.
        Parameters:
        positions - ArrayList of Positions of all the possible moves.

      • clearHighlightTile

        public void clearHighlightTile()
        Clears all the highlighted tiles.

      • getPiece

        public Piece getPiece()
        Gets the piece of the tile.
        Returns:
        Piece is returned of the tile.

      • setPiece

        public void setPiece(Piece piece)
        Sets a piece to the tile.
        Parameters:
        piece - Piece to set on the tile.

        Remove piece from the tile
